com.device.login.rest.api

Interface ILoginServerUserAuthenticationAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoginServerUserAuthenticationAPIImpl

    public interface ILoginServerUserAuthenticationAPI
    This interface provides the method necessary for User Authentication. It is used by the ILoginServerUserAuthenticationClient
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserLoginRequest createUserLoginRequest(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String requestAuthenticationStr, java.lang.String appSessionID, java.lang.String appUsername, javax.crypto.SecretKey appSessionIDKey, javax.crypto.SecretKey serviceSessionKey)
      This method creates a UserLoginRequest
      UserSession processUserLoginResponse(java.lang.String encUsername, java.lang.String encUserSessionID, java.lang.String encResponseAuthenticator, java.lang.String encExpiryTime, AppSession appSession, java.util.Date requestAuthenticator, javax.crypto.SecretKey appSessionIDKey) 

    • Method Detail

      • createUserLoginRequest

        UserLoginRequest createUserLoginRequest(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String requestAuthenticationStr,
                                      java.lang.String appSessionID,
                                      java.lang.String appUsername,
                                      javax.crypto.SecretKey appSessionIDKey,
                                      javax.crypto.SecretKey serviceSessionKey)
        This method creates a UserLoginRequest
        Parameters:
        String - username
        String - password
        String - Request Authenticator
        String - App Session ID created by the Login Service
        String - App Login Name
        SecretKey - Key generated from App Session IDs
        SecretKey - Key generated from the Kerberos Service Session ID
        Returns:
        UserLoginRequest

      • processUserLoginResponse

        UserSession processUserLoginResponse(java.lang.String encUsername,
                                   java.lang.String encUserSessionID,
                                   java.lang.String encResponseAuthenticator,
                                   java.lang.String encExpiryTime,
                                   AppSession appSession,
                                   java.util.Date requestAuthenticator,
                                   javax.crypto.SecretKey appSessionIDKey)
                                     throws InvalidResponseAuthenticatorException
        Parameters:
        String - Encrypted User name from User Login Response
        String - Encrypted User Session ID
        String - Encrypted Response Authenticator
        String - Encrypted Expiry Time
        AppSession - appSession
        Data - requestAuthenticator
        SecretKey - appSessionIDKey
        Returns:
        UserSession or null if the User Authentication fails!
        Throws:
        InvalidResponseAuthenticatorException
